Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 11 STRIKE UAVs KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ At the end of September ...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mikola Oleshchuk⚡️ 11 STRIKE UAVS KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 19, 2024, the Russian occupiers ordered the attack of the 11th strike UAV type - Shahed - from Kursk directly and Primorsko-Akhtarska – rf.💥 As a result of the anti-aircraft battle by mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, anti-aircraft missile units, aviation and by the REB of the Air Force, all UAVs were shot down near Mykolayivska, Vinnytsia, Kiev, Dnipropetrovsk, Kharkiv, Sumy and Donetsk regions. 🇺🇦 Together - until victory!➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander of the Air Force, Lieutenant General Mikola Oleshchuk
